text: Kramgoa låtar 1998 was released in 1998 as CD and cassette tape and is a Vikingarna studio album. It sold platinum in both Sweden and Norway, and sold totally 175 000 copies. ==Track listing== ===Side A=== #Kan man älska nå'n på avstånd #Skogsstjärna #One Night with You #Kom till mej #Lika blå som dina ögon #En gammaldags låt #När det regnar ===Side B=== #En söndag i April #Galen i dig #Små små ord #Min sång om kärleken #Änglasjäl #Treat Me Nice #Jag saknar dig ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Chart (1998-1999) ! Peak position |- | Norway (VG-lista) |align="center"|10 |- | Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) |align="center"|4 |} == References == Category:1998 albums Category:Vikingarna (band) albums Category:Swedish-language albums
title: Kramgoa låtar 1998
